On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will preview Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton’s Commander-in-Chief Forum to be moderated Wednesday evening by NBC’s Matt Lauer.
Ed Martin, the President of Schlafly’s Eagle Forum, will discuss Schlafly’s final book, which he co-authored with her and Brett M. Decker, titled The Conservative Case for Trump.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Ann Coulter, bestselling author of In Trump We Trust and Adios, America, will discuss her moving obituary of conservative icon Phyllis Schlafly.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
He’ll be joined by veteran pollster Pat Caddell and Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
